title: Constructivist-Based Practical Training for Enhancing Pharmacy Staff Supervision Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Educational environment emphasizing mentoring and reflective practice in practical training settings.

learning_goals: Learners can complete basic document-writing skills required for pharmacy operations and personnel supervision by applying them to real-world cases.
Learners can analyze on-site supervisory issues and develop resolution strategies through a constructivist approach.
Learners can reflect on their supervisory performance abilities in the form of a reflective practice journal based on peer evaluations and mentor feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
